note: I like original metaphors, well-crafted novels, and non-fiction in biology, chemistry, criminology, psychology, and psychiatry. I am on the absurdist-humanist continuum, agnostic rather than atheist only because I have seen too much weirdness to be certain of anything. I spend much of my time as a family caregiver. I am occasionally a fierce and pragmatic policy advocate for those with serious psychiatric illnesses. I enjoy reading, hiking, music. I am a retired university administrator. 💚🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️ BLM
